dcterms:creator: Y. LeCun
C. Cortes
C. J. Burges
dcterms:description: The permuted MNIST dataset is constructed by applying random permutations to the original MNIST dataset, creating multiple tasks where each task consists of the same images but with different label mappings.
dcterms:title: Permuted MNIST

dcterms:creator: A. Krizhevsky
G. Hinton
dcterms:description: Split CIFAR-10/100 consists of the CIFAR-10 dataset for the first task and subsequent tasks created from the CIFAR-100 dataset, where each task contains a subset of classes.
dcterms:title: Split CIFAR-10/100

dcterms:creator: T. Jian
B. C. Rendon
E. Ojuba
N. Soltani
Z. Wang
K. Sankhe
A. Gritsenko
J. Dy
K. Chowdhury
S. Ioannidis
dcterms:description: The Split RF dataset contains radio frequency signals from multiple WiFi devices, partitioned into tasks for classification.
dcterms:title: Split RF (Radio Frequency Fingerprinting)
